document_data.name: Igedrazaar's Miasma
document_data.mainbody: '''''Igedrazaar's miasma''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell created a toxic fog. The fog was gray in color and had a disgusting appearance. Any creature within the fog suffered damage, whether they held their breath or not.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a focus, three grey stones that were polished to a shine.
